in.teramatrix.googleservices.service

Class Locator

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.teramatrix.googleservices.service.Locator

  • public class Locator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is designed to show current location on GoogleMap. Here A Marker and a Circle will be plotted on the map. Marker will show the position and circle will show accuracy of location. To animate circle according to increment and decrement in location accuracy, a method is defined that is animateCircle(). There is two methods to make this class work, these are locate() and locateMe(). In locate(), you can pass any location but on the other hand, in lcoateMe(), FusedLocationProvider will be used to get location and only current location will shown on the map. locateMe() will return the running instance of FusedLocationProvider so you can stop location updates anytime by calling stop() method of FusedLocationProvider class or to stop locating, just call stop() of this class. It will remove Marker and Circle also.
    Author:
    Mohsin Khan
    Date:
    4/13/2016

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean accuracyLayer
      Accuracy layer (Circle will not be visible if this is false.

      A single instance of marker, to show the location
      private int markerIcon
      Location marker that will be shown on the map
      private FusedLocationProvider provider
      To fetch current location of device.
      private android.location.Location recent
      If calculating distance from latest location, this will be the factor from the distance will be calculated.
      private boolean rotation
      Marker will be rotated according to bearing of last location if true
      private java.lang.String strokeColor
      It is border color of the circle that will show accuracy

      • locateMe

        public FusedLocationProvider locateMe(android.content.Context context)
        This will plot current location Marker on the GoogleMap using FusedLocationProvider
        Parameters:
        context - to initialize FusedLocationProvider
        Returns:
        running instance of FusedLocationProvider to stop updates later or whenever you want.

      • locate

        public com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Marker locate(android.location.Location location)
        This method will maintain a Marker and a Circle on the map. Every time a location is passed in this method, and the method will remove previous Marker & Circle and plot a new Marker and Circle on the new Location you passed in the parameter.
        Parameters:
        location - where current location marker will be plotted

      • animateCircle

        private void animateCircle(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Circle c,
                           double r)
        Method will generate animation like effects by increasing/decreasing the value of Circle radius using Android's Handler. One more thing to consider that here I'm checking if new radius is just one meter up/down with the existing radius then this animation will not work. It will be stable in that condition.
        Parameters:
        c - circle to be animated
        r - new radius value

      • animateCircle

        private void animateCircle(android.content.Context cxt,
                           com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Circle c,
                           double r)
        Method will generate animation like effects by increasing/decreasing the value of Circle radius using Java's Timer. One more thing to consider that here I'm checking if new radius is just one meter up/down with the existing radius then this animation will not work. It will be stable in that condition.
        Parameters:
        cxt - context to execute on main thread
        c - circle to be animated
        r - new radius value

      • animateCircle

        private void animateCircle(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Circle circle)
        Parameters:
        circle - circle to be animated

      • moveMarker

        private void moveMarker(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Marker marker,
                        com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng toPosition)
        Method will move marker from one location to another location smoothly.
        Parameters:
        marker - which is to be moved
        toPosition - destination

      • stop

        public void stop()
        To stop monitoring current location. This method will stop Location Provider that is FusedLocationProvider and will remove current location Marker and accuracy Circle.
